event_title: The Legacy of Thaum Pt. III: Changeling

interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " Everything Ephemeral (Face Forward) " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " Good Morning " .

progression.synopsis: Molly DMs another Dungeons & Dragons session . Tsuneyo , who has previously just watched, is now participating. Eventually, Otoha and Noriko drop by — Rin is flustered about Otoha's presence, while Maya is annoyed about Noriko's. Noriko leaves. Otoha asks if she can play, but Molly says no — this prompts an argument between Rin and Molly. Molly runs away.

event_references.event_default_name: The Legacy of Thaum Pt. III: Changeling

changelog: This Event was added in Update .19p2.
